weatherFormat1:
%name%: %dateMonth4% %dateDay2%, %timeH2%:%timeM% %ampm1% %icon%

当前温度: %temp%°C • 体感温度: %feels%°C

风力: %wind-speed% km/h
风向: %wind-dir%
最大阵风: %wind-gust% km/h

日升: %sunrise% • 日落: %sunset%
weatherFormat2:
%name%: %dateMonth4% %dateDay2% - %timeH2%:%timeM% %ampm1%
Current Temp: %temp%°C • Feels Like: %feels%°C
Wind: %wind-speed% km/h from the %wind-dir%^ with gusts up to %wind-gust% km/h^
Sunrise: %sunrise% • Sunset: %sunset%
weatherFormat3:
%icon% %dateMonth4% %dateDay2% %dateYear1% • %timeH2%:%timeM% %ampm1% • %desc%
 Recorded Temp: %temp% • Felt like: %feels%
 Wind: %wind-speed% km/h from the %wind-dir%^ with gusts up to %wind-gust% km/h^
 Sunrise: %sunrise% • Sunset: %sunset%
weatherFormat4:
%icon% %dateMonth4% %dateDay2% %dateYear1% • %timeH2%:%timeM% %ampm1% • %desc%
 Current Temp: %temp% • Feels like: %feels%
 Wind: %wind-speed% km/h from the %wind-dir%^ with gusts up to %wind-gust% km/h^
 Sunrise: %sunrise% • Sunset: %sunset%
